content.1: I lifted up mine eyes again, and looked, and behold a man with a measuring line in his hand.
content.2: Then said I, Whither goest thou? And he said unto me, To measure Jerusalem, to see what
content.3: And, behold, the angel that talked with me went forth, and another angel went out to meet him,
content.4: And said unto him, Run, speak to this young man, saying, Jerusalem shall be inhabited
